domain
Class Controls

java.lang.Object
  domain.Controls

public class Controls
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as the controls manager. it's the responsible of mapping the FiredAction from the FiredActionable instances of the Environment to the Events received from the GameEngine.

Method Detail

getFiredAction

protected FiredAction getFiredAction(int eventCode)
This method returns the FiredAction assigned to this event code.

Parameters:
eventCode - The key value in the controlMap HashMap field
Returns:
The FiredAction mapped or null if there is no value for the key

getEventCode

protected java.lang.Integer getEventCode(FiredAction firedAction)
This method returns the event code wich is the key for a FiredAction value at the controlMap HashMap.

Parameters:
firedAction - The FiredAction instance for wich its key is requested
Returns:
An Integer object containing the key value, or null if the FiredAction was not found in the HashMap.

setKeyCodeForFiredAction

protected void setKeyCodeForFiredAction(int oldKeyCode,
                                        int newKeyCode)
This method is used to set the current eventcode wich is mapping a FiredAction for another. This can be used to set controls.

Parameters:
oldKeyCode - The current key value at the controlMap
newKeyCode - The new key value at the controlMap

getFiredActions

protected FiredAction[] getFiredActions()
Returns:
a FiredAction array containing all the FiredAction instances hold by the controlMap HashMap.

getEventCodes

protected java.lang.Integer[] getEventCodes()
Returns:
an Integer array containing all the Integer instances representing the key values at the controlMap HashMap.

getControls

protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,FiredAction> getControls()
Returns:
The entire controlMap HashMap, containing all the Integer keys and the FiredActions mapped.

instantiate

public static Controls instantiate()
This method is used to get a Controls instance following the Single-Town model

Returns:
a Controls instance.

initialize

protected void initialize(java.util.ArrayList<FiredActionable> firedActionables)
                   throws java.security.KeyException
This method is used to initialize the controlMap HashMap. From each FiredActionable contained in the passed ArrayList, it's actions are taken. From each FiredAction instance in the Action ArrayList taken, it's default event code is taken. Once the keys an the values are obtained, then they are put into the controlMap HashMap.

Parameters:
firedActionables - The game FiredActionable instances.
Throws:
java.security.KeyException - if any of the FiredActionable instances have a duplied default event code.
